biotools.summary:
Aperture is a new alignment-free SV caller designed for cfDNA dataset. Aperture applies a unique strategy of k-mer based searching, fast breakpoint detection using binary labels and candidates clustering to detect SVs and viral integrations in high sensitivity, especially when junctions span repetitive regions, followed by a barcode based filter to ensure specificity.
Aperture takes paired-end reads in fastq format as inputs and reports all SVs and viral integrations in VCF 4.2 format.
